summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account over the month of April 2014. It includes various debits and credits, highlighting significant transactions such as payroll fees and tax payments. The document is marked confidential and is part of the evidence related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: John Christensen
persons.context: John Christensen is referenced in relation to outgoing money transfers from the account.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby serves as the account manager for John Christensen's account at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Account Balance Summary Start
events.description: The account balance is summarized at the beginning of April 2014.

events.title: Account Balance Summary End
events.description: The account balance is summarized at the end of April 2014, showing various transactions throughout the month.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for April 2014, including significant debits for payroll and tax services.
Amanda Kirby is identified as the contact person for account-related inquiries.
John Christensen is mentioned multiple times in relation to outgoing transfers and account management.
The document is marked confidential and is part of the evidence in the Epstein case.
Various preauthorized debits and credits are listed, indicating regular financial activity.
